content: round 10 2 single_crochet 1 bobble x 14 42 round 11 42 single_crochet 42 round 12 1 single_crochet 1 bobble 2sc 1 bobble x 13 1 single_crochet 42 round 13 42 single_crochet 42 round 14 1 bobble 2 single_crochet x 14 42 round 15 42 single_crochet 42 round 16 2 single_crochet 1 bobble x 5 decrease 1 bobble x 3 decrease 1 bobble 2 single_crochet x 5 1 bobble 38 round 17 10 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet x 4 decrease 10 single_crochet 33 stuff the body with filling and keep doing as you go round 18 1 single_crochet 1 bobble 2 single_crochet x 3 decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet 1 bobble x 3 1 single_crochet 29 round 19 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet decrease x 5 2 single_crochet 24 round 20 24 24 fasten_off and leave a long yarn tail to sew the body to the head 10 tail do not stuff work with creme color round 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 round 2 increase 1 single_crochet x 2 6 round 3 increase 2 single_crochet x 2 8 round 4 increase 3 single_crochet x 2 10 round 5-6 10 single_crochet 2 rounds 10 round 7 decrease 3 single_crochet x 2 8 round 8 decrease 2 single_crochet x 2 6 fasten_off and leave a long yarn tail to sew to the body 11 assembly start by embroider the nose use image above as your guide attach the head on the body the head should lean downwards and the chin will almost touch the stomach attach the ears on each side of the head at round 16 aligned below the eyes - use image above as your guide the ears should point downwards sew on the side so they stay pointing down 12 place the legs on each side between round 6 and 12 just where the bobble stitches starts tip before you start to sew place the both legs as you want it with pins and place the love lamb on a straight table now you will see if they are placed correctly against each other and that the body s bottom still touches the ground attach the legs not just on the edge sew also the inside of the leg against the body this is to make sure that the legs will always stay close to the body see dotted line above place the arms on each side between round 14 and 16 aligned with the legs one bobble stitch inbetween the leg and arm attach the arms not just on the edge sew also the inside of the arm against the body this is to make sure that the arms will always stay close to the body see dotted line above 13 attach the tail pointing upwards on rounds 5-7 centered on the back now you are done 14 please share your gorgeous work tag me on instagram congrats @handmade_by_halime love lamb is done thank you for making her
